title: [Large-Scale] HIV/AIDS Stigma and Discrimination Reduction Education Through Gamification

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic medical knowledge and public health concepts
context.additional_context: Providing a mobile-based gamified learning environment with digital device support for current healthcare professionals

learning_goals: Learners can accurately understand scientific information about HIV/AIDS and correct over 80% of misconceptions
Learners can improve critical thinking skills in patient response simulations by over 70% through gamification mission completion
Learners can present concrete educational campaign designs to reduce HIV/AIDS discrimination in project-based assessments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
